title: Create shareable Promise Day single-page site with overlay emoji shower and specified photo layout

requirements.text: Create a public, shareable single-page website that reproduces the provided Promise Day greeting page (hero emoji, card layout, message text, signature, and the three provided photo URLs) and loads without requiring authentication.

quotes: Make this into a website that I can share with my boyfriend.

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the app root (/) shows the Promise Day page content without requiring login.
The page includes the same visible content as the provided HTML: hero ü§ù, heading, message paragraphs, and signature text in English as provided.
The three images load from the exact URLs provided in the user HTML and render on the page.

requirements.text: Update the emoji shower animation so emojis render as an overlay on top of the card content (photos and message), rather than appearing behind or below it; the overlay must not block scrolling or clicks on the underlying page content.

quotes: I want the emoji shower to be over the photos and the message, not below it.

acceptanceCriteria: Falling/bursting emojis visually pass over the photos and the message text (higher stacking order than the card and its contents).
Emoji elements do not prevent interaction with the page (e.g., pointer events do not block clicks/scroll).
Emoji elements are cleaned up after animation completes (no unbounded DOM growth).

requirements.text: Implement the requested photo layout: the rings photo is displayed first at the top of the card, and the remaining two photos are displayed below it side-by-side (wrapping on small screens).

quotes: I want the first photo with the rings to be on top and the last two photos to be below.

acceptanceCriteria: The rings image appears above the two other images in the card.
The two non-rings images appear beneath the rings image in a 2-column grid on typical mobile/desktop widths and wrap appropriately on narrow screens.
All images maintain a consistent, polished styling (rounded corners and sensible sizing) and remain responsive.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, romantic visual theme (color palette, typography scale, spacing, and card styling) consistent across the page, without using a blue/purple-dominant scheme.
acceptanceCriteria: The page has a consistent visual system (background, card, headings, body text) that feels intentionally designed.
The layout remains readable and visually balanced on mobile and desktop widths.

constraints: Frontend must use the pre-injected React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui + React Query template.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend (Motoko) is single-actor; only add backend code if strictly necessary for the requested functionality.
nonGoals: Adding user accounts or Internet Identity authentication.
Adding a CMS/editor for changing the message or images.
Storing images or message content in the backend.
Multi-page routing or complex navigation beyond a single shareable page.
